title: Rule 15: Exemptions for Research, Archiving, and Statistical Purposes
description: Rule 15 recognizes that not all processing of personal data serves commercial or service-related goals. Sometimes, data is required for research, archiving, or statistical purposes, and in such cases, certain exemptions are granted under the law.
